quotes.quote: Heaven and stars at the feet of the lovers
quotes.author: Kristian Goldmund Aumann

quotes.quote: The best proof of love is trust
quotes.author: Joyce Brothers

quotes.quote: Some people feel the rain, others just get wet.
quotes.author: Bob Marley

quotes.quote: To alcohol! The cause of, and solution to, all of life's problems.
quotes.author: Homer J. Simpson

quotes.quote: Even if loving meant leaving, or solitude, or sorrow, love was worth every penny of its price
quotes.author: Paulo Coelho

quotes.quote: I gave him my heart, and he took and pinched it to death, and flung it back to me
quotes.author: Emily Bronte

quotes.quote: I was with you and i have left traces in your heart, but the wind did not hear our voices.
quotes.author: Kristian Goldmund Aumann

quotes.quote: Heaven without love : what a hell
quotes.author: Charles de LEUSSE

quotes.quote: All I say is, kings is kings, and you got to make allowances. Take them all around, they're a mighty ornery lot. It's the way they're raised.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: Love, as it exists in society, is nothing but the exchange of two fantasies and the contact of two skins
quotes.author: Nicolas Chamfort
